message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While I value the product at a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. How about we meet at $10,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I really think that's the highest I can go.
